name: EnvioSmartBuilding
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights”
”Alexa, turn on the air condition”
”Alexa, increase temperature in the room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Envio, you simplified the management of your smart building. With the Envio Smart Building skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now control your devices using Amazon smart speakers or the Amazon Alexa app.

To use the Envio Smart Building skill you need an Envio account and a building onboarded to the Envio Smart Building Platform. The skill is linked to your Envio account and enables you to control your devices such are lights or air conditioners. Please get in touch with your Envio representative for further information on onboarding.
